name: TEXminer
short_description:
TEXminer uses Text Mining Methods to analyze Unicode Files as plain Text or PDF.
The Text Database can be saved in XML where the orginal Text, the Sentence and Word Lists and additional Parameters (e.g. Abbreviations) are stored.
TEXminer allows Language Detection by Letter Frequency Analysis, finding important Words by 
Cooccurrence Analysis, Determination of Central Expressions, Thematic Model Statistics (also Semantic Groups) and Fingerprint Comparison. 
Because TEXminer is not disigned to have a Reference Corpus, Thematic Model Statistics uses Language Models to have Background Nowledge about certain Languages (English, German, French, Spanish, Russian), which are derived from the Decaleon Project.
The Thematic Models have been extended in the last months. 
The Thematic Models for Technical Terms are in progress till mid of 2016.
summary: Text Mining for Texts in ASCII, Unicode and PDF Format.
